sentences.english: Notice everybody in the church has some familial role.
sentences.chinese: 他给教会里每个人一个熟习的角色。

sentences.english: I don't know him well enough to ask him for help.
sentences.chinese: 我和他不够熟习，不好请他佐理。

sentences.english: Therefore, in our country, more and more people are aware of the importance of CPR.
sentences.chinese: 在海内，越来越多的人开始熟习到电子病历的主要性。

sentences.english: Not the probability of be skilful at and explanation must check textbook.
sentences.chinese: 不熟习的概率和解释一定要查课本。

sentences.english: He is very familiar with the geographical features of this district.
sentences.chinese: 他对这一地域的地舆特性很熟习。

sentences.english: You also need to show that you have a well-developed plan of study and are knowledgeable about the subject you are studying.
sentences.chinese: 你还需表明，你有良好的学习计划，并熟习所学专业。

sentences.english: The room was familiar; it hmarketing been belonged to me since I was given birth to.
sentences.chinese: 这间屋子我很熟习，从我诞生时起它就属于我了。

sentences.english: MaXiao resolutely shot, but only hear the familiar hollow ring.
sentences.chinese: 马啸毅然开枪，却只听见熟习的空响。

sentences.english: A few more examples should be added to highlight the already familiar facts.
sentences.chinese: 还需要增加多少个例子强调已经很熟习的本相。

sentences.english: That every corner is stamped by familiar footprints.
sentences.chinese: 小到每一个经过的角落都刻下了熟习的脚印。

sentences.english: Are you familiar with the performance of this type of transistor amplifier?
sentences.chinese: 你熟习这种晶体管缩小器的功用吗？

definition: proficient (in sth)/to understand sth through and through
to learn by heart/to commit to memory/to remember/to memorize in silence
have wide learning and a retentive memory/have encyclopedic knowledge
handling any occasion smoothly (idiom); equal to any situation
foundation/grounding/background/what lies at the bottom of sth/root/cause
variant of 該博|该博[gai1 bo2]
